articles.title: Record numbers: 73 companies announce bonus issues so far - Economic Times
articles.description: Bonus shares are additional shares a company gives free to its existing shareholders based on the number of shares they hold. For instance, a company could give one bonus share for one share held or two bonus shares for every share owned by the investor.
articles.content: Mumbai: Indian companies are giving out bonus shares in record numbers as managements look to reward loyal investors after a good post-pandemic performance in FY22. So far this year, 73 companies hav… [+3384 chars]

articles.author: Ketan Thakkar and Ashutosh R Shyam
articles.title: Auto companies capex set to cross $3 billion in FY23 - Economic Times
articles.description: ​​​​The automotive market capex is set to cross $3 billion, or ₹27,000 cr, in FY23, posting a growth of 24% as per estimates by Axis Capital. The forecast capital investment of auto companies in FY23 will surpass the pre-Covid capex peak of ₹26,800 cr in FY20.
articles.content:
Mumbai: As the economy gains momentum and vehicle output witnesses a new record, the automotive market is leading the pace of growth in manufacturing capex in FY23.

articles.author: Nehal Chaliawala
articles.title: Hindustan Zinc reports best quarterly performance backed by favourable commodity prices - Economic Times
articles.description: ​The Vedanta Group company reported a 44% year-on-year growth in its consolidated topline to Rs 9,387 crore. ​High power and fuel costs meant that the companys cost of production for zinc during the quarter went up by 23% year-on-year to Rs 97,423 per ton.
articles.content:
Mumbai: Hindustan Zinc on Thursday reported its best-ever quarterly earnings performance backed by high metal production and favourable commodity prices.
